description: An open letter calls for an end to discrimination in Poland, where LGBT people have faced hostility.
title: Poland LGBT: Diplomats from 50 countries call for end to discrimination
title_page: Poland LGBT: Diplomats from 50 countries call for end to discrimination - BBC News
maintext: Ambassadors from around the world have called for the rights of gay and transgender people to be respected in Poland, where many towns have declared themselves free of "LGBT ideology".
